name: SoleStage
description:
*Notice: The game requires microphone access to play

Welcome to the Friday afternoon session of performance - "SoleStage" talks! Enjoy a relaxing conversation time to release your stress and venture into a new world. Use the microphone to play.

---

This is the final project for the Fall 2022 Intro to Game Engine course.

- Project requirement: the game can only be played using the microphone

---

- Tilemap: Bit-pack

- Character: Generated by Creature Mixer

- Gamemaker Mic Control code snippet: Get Microphone Volume

All other art assets and codes are made by myself.
